long_description: When the trip takes you through parking lots, over curbs and conveyor belts, with a stop in the baggage compartment, the REI Inside Passage 28 is adept. Expansion zipper adds 7 liters of cargo space. Inside Passage 28 is sized perfectly to take full advantage of checking just 1 bag; whether for just 1 or shared between 2, you'll gladly avoid checked-bag fees. REI delivers thoughtful organization and durable materials for the long haul; this structured luggage is not only easy to pack, but sports stylish influences and handy details. Exterior pocket is sized for travel documents, tickets and boarding passes; contrasting inner color helps you locate items. Rugged telescoping pull handle locks in up/down position and has soft-touch handle grip for comfort and control; rugged wheels are smooth-rolling and quiet. Secure ID window on back panel. Interior zippered mesh and water-resistant pockets; 2 interior, adjustable straps compress and control of packed items. Rear-tilting design provides upright stability for transport ease and tip-over prevention. Top and side grab handles ensure easy hauling of the REI Inside Passage 28. Inside Passage Access cargo bag (sold separately) is a convenient companion piece designed to fit and function with the Inside Passage 28.
short_description: When the trip takes you through parking lots, over curbs and conveyor belts, with a stop in the baggage compartment, the REI Inside Passage 28 is adept. Expansion zipper adds 7 liters of cargo space.
